title: Prayer for fame
creator_credit: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She shares her early youth and the things that interested her throughout her life, culminating in a passion for performance. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
